text:
Blake Lively’s ‘80s Curls

It was all about the glam for the A Simple Favor actress at the Versace pre-fall 2019 fashion show in NYC on Sunday, December 2, where she rocked a head full of voluminous curls courtesy of mane man Rod Ortega. The best part? The fun ’do was secured behind her right ear with a sparkly hair accessory (we love celeb hairstylist Justine Marjan’s new line with Kitsch) for added glitz.
title: Holiday 2018 Beauty: Celeb-Inspired Hair, Makeup Ideas
